named-native-query.name: User.dashboard
named-native-query.query: SELECT * FROM (SELECT Sum(carbohydrates) as carbohydrates FROM food WHERE user_id = :userID) AS F, (SELECT Sum(CASE WHEN value > 180 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as highs, Sum(CASE WHEN value < 70 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as lows, Avg(value) as average, Max(value) - Min(value) as changes FROM glucose WHERE user_id = :userID GROUP BY user_id) AS G, (SELECT Sum(quantity) as score from score where user_id = :userID) AS S
